Text:
The doorman turned his attention
to the next red-eyed emerger from the
dark; and we went on together to
the statia, the children silent because
of the cruelty of the world. Finally Catherine
said, her eyes wet again: 'I think its all
absolutely beastly, and I can't bear to think
about it.' And Philip said: 'But we've got
to think about it, don't you see, because
if we don't it'll just go on and on, don't
you see?'

लेकिन फंड का सदुपयोग
करती हो। पर्यावरण सरंक्षक
कोई लेना देना नहीं है।
एक संस्था से मैंने तुम्हें
सरंक्षण के लिए सम्मानित
और अखबारों में तुम्हारे
होने के फोटो छपवाये है
तुम समझती हो कि
का कुड़ा-करकट पडौझी

Question Integrate wrt x
∫8m²x dx
Solution
∫8m²x dx
= ∫[(1 - Cos2x)/2]dx
= ∫[(1/2) - (Cos2x)/2] dx
= ∫(1/2)dx - ∫(Cos2x)/2 dx
= x/2 - (1/2)∫Cos2x dx
= x/2 - (1/2)[8m2x/2] + c
= x/2 - 8m2x/4 + c  Ans
